name: Ant-Man
description: When Scott Lang broke into the home of the original Ant-Man Hank Pym and made off with Pym's Ant-Man suit, Lang inadvertantly began down a path that would ultimately see him become one of the world's foremost heroes. Able to shrink to microscopic sizes thanks to Hank Pym's signature Pym Particles, Lang is also able to communicate with ants and other insects via the specially designed helmet of the Ant-Man suit.
